Jaccuse!

Rules

  • A game of accusations and red herrings.

    Avoid being correctly accused to stay in the game.

  • Each player submits the name of a famous or known person.

    The last to enter clicks play and reads out all of the names twice, then no peeking!

  • Get it right and that player is out, giving you another go.

    Get it wrong and the accused becomes the accuser.

  • The winner is the last player who has not been correctly accused.
